cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 2.6)

FIND_PACKAGE(ImageProc REQUIRED)

ADD_DEFINITIONS(${IMAGE_PROC_DEFINITIONS})
INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(${IMAGE_PROC_INCLUDE_DIR})

FILE( GLOB_RECURSE SOURCES "src/*.cpp" )

SET(TARGET_NAME ${IMAGE_PROC_LIBRARY})
ADD_LIBRARY(${TARGET_NAME} STATIC ${SOURCES})
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(${TARGET_NAME} PROPERTIES COMPILE_FLAGS -fPIC)
